scene_description_enriched: This image is divided into four quadrants, each depicting a different evangelist or prophet. The top left quadrant shows a winged figure, likely an angel, seated in a landscape with a body of water and trees. The figure holds a scroll and appears to be writing. The top right quadrant depicts a bearded man with a halo, seated indoors, writing on a scroll at a lectern. A lion is visible to his right. The bottom left quadrant shows a bearded man with a halo, seated indoors, with a young boy reaching towards him. The man holds a scroll and is writing. The bottom right quadrant shows a man with a blue cap, seated indoors, writing on a scroll. A goat is present to his right. All figures are depicted with halos, suggesting their religious significance. The indoor scenes are characterized by patterned drapery and architectural elements like windows.
